title: [Self-directed] Gamification-based Mobile Math Learning Motivation and Environment Improvement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic operations and fundamental algebraic concepts
context.additional_context: Application of a gamified mobile mathematics learning system in offline classroom settings within BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can enhance motivation for solving math problems by 30% or more using gamification elements in an MMOG-style environment.
Learners can form self-directed learning habits by achieving an 85% or higher quest completion rate in a mobile learning system.
Learners can link virtual rewards (badges/points) earned in gamified environments to actual assessment scores (7 or higher out of 10).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
